name: The Phantom Knights of Lost Vambrace
text:
Target 1 face-up monster on the field; if that monster is still face-up on the field, apply the following effect, then Special Summon this card in Defense Position as a Normal Monster (Warrior-Type/DARK/Level 2/ATK 600/DEF 0). (This card is NOT treated as a Trap Card.)
â—? Until the end of this turn, the targeted monster loses 600 ATK, its Level becomes 2, also "The Phantom Knights" monsters you control cannot be destroyed by battle.
